title: Police Capture Suspect in Shooting of Two Rookie Officers
description: The New Jersey man, who was also wanted in connection with a shooting in Newark several days earlier, was charged with two counts of attempted murder.
dc:creator: Tracey Tully
media:credit: Bryan Anselm for The New York Times
media:description: The shooting shut down the Weequahic neighborhood of Newark on Tuesday. The police announced on Wednesday that they had captured the suspected gunman.
